list_items: Added update column to the menu, including implementation in the data source menu with styling improvements.
Improved backstage functionality for enhanced user experience.
Implemented the ability to store and open PBMX files in the Peakboard Hub.
Enhanced 'Device/Checktime' endpoint to include AM/PM information.
Added hub flow lists to the Peakboard Hub List Datasource for better data management.
Implemented Peakboard Hub as a new resource type for better integration.
Added a building block for filling a string with characters, enhancing scripting capabilities.
Implemented Peakboard Hub files as source type for data sources like CSV and JSON.
Added a default date data source in new projects for convenience.
Fixed issue where PBFX files could not be opened directly in the Peakboard Designer from the file manager.
Updated data type in filters to correspond with the type of the chosen column, allowing correct comparisons.
Enabled users to be informed when no document entry is found during search.
Improved Filter UI allowing easier choice of current columns with added informational text.
Enabled dynamic default timeframe using default time data source in Teams, Calendar, and Outlook.
Fixed errors when using more than four 'OR' conditions within a filter.
Addressed incorrect inclusion/exclusion functionality in dataflow context menu filters.
Rectified issues where new columns added by 'Add column' or join steps in Dataflow threw fatal errors.
Resolved issue with renaming a variable used in a filter not updating the variable name within the dataflow filter.
Improved Hub Dialog positioning to ensure buttons are not hidden.
Optimized scaling behavior of table columns containing long texts.
Added right-click option to copy and match style (appearance) across controls.
Introduced 'bring forward/backward' options beside 'bring to front/send to back' in the main designer.
Improved control renaming functionality in scripts to ensure accurate reference changes.
Fixed blurry template files for clearer presentation.
Corrected display issues of title and subtitle in preview mode.
Rectified toggle button functionality in the script editor.
Implemented lazy loading for the Box Manage dialog to optimize performance.
Allowed editing of resolution in Box management dialog for better performance on 4K devices.
Added Hub authentication for secure communication between Peakboard Designer and Peakboard Box.
Enhanced Teams data source to provide a better time format for the 'Date' column.
Fixed high CPU/GPU usage when idle PDFs were present.
Enhanced Teams data source with better error messages when 'Retrieve message from' is not selected.
Enabled sending a subject (header) with messages in Teams Snippet and Building Block.
Improved handling of timestamps in Teams/Outlook data sources, correcting a 2-hour offset.
Allowed reading of all threads with answers in a channel by adding relevant filter options.
Added a date data source per default in new projects.
Enabled Copy/Paste functionality for MAC and IP Address in Box Dialog.
Improved Checkbox/Radio button label padding display based on label position.
Fixed scaling issues with checkboxes and radio buttons' icon size and scale.
Resolved automatic reference change issue in scripts when renaming Controls on different screens.
